extendedInfo.description: Professional barometer for your device._âââ_ Barometer _âââ_âââââââââââââââââââProfessional barometer for your device.It measures atmospheric pressure and estimates altitude.Features:ââââââââ  direct reading in mBar or mmHgâ  realistic vintage aneroid lookâ  alternative digital displayâ  includes barometric altimeterâ  altitude in meters or feetâ  18 case skinsâ  freeNOTE:âââââThis app requires device with a pressure sensor. It uses pressure sensor data to give accurate and instant atmospheric pressure reading. This reading is also used to estimate altitude without using GPS. Note that the altitude measurement can be inaccurate, especially when the weather is changing or during a storm. Do not install or rate this app if your device does not have a humidity sensor.

reviews.title: Xperia Z
reviews.comment: Bravo Borce sekoj cest za aplikacijava 5 star
reviews.author: Vlatko Milenkovski

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: It\'s so sensitive that I can see pressure difference between the floor and the ceiling in my room. Cool!
reviews.author: Nikola Ristevski

reviews.title: Compatible with my device but ...
reviews.comment: it doesn\'t work on my device, it doesn\'t have a pressure sensor.  Can I give it no stars, at least no stars to the clown who said it\'s \'compatible with my device.\'
reviews.author: John Salkeld

reviews.title: Adverts
reviews.comment: No way to turn off the adverts.  I\'d happily pay for the app,  but if the adverts are required, I\'ll find an alternative.
reviews.author: Richard Neill
